review.description: I'm searching for a GOOD pizza place near where I live and this place could possibly fill that void.  They have a good special - 2 regular slices and a soda for $5.  I need to come here a few more times before they earn my official trust and respect (and a higher star rating)... but I do see potential.
review.author: Brandon R.

review.description: This place is awful. Staff is hostile and rude. The pizza maker flirts with 13 year olds. Really horrible service too. Once got yelled at for asking for an extra napkin here. Evensaw a roach floating in the toilet at this "restaurant" before. if it comes down to npt eating, or eating here, id rather starve.
review.author: Summer S.
